skills.name: WRECK
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 35% Chance for each ally to gain Magic Penetration for 2 turns.

skills.name: RAZE
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• Damage dealt increases based on your Missing HP.

skills.name: BANE
desc: • Curse enemies for 2 turns at the start of battle.
• Gain Invincibility if Regen is active at the start of your turn.
• Cursed enemies take increased damage from all sources..
